attributes.action: Withdraw from hosting the 2012 Olympics. The costs of hosting the Olympic games are now close to £10Billion. The British Taxpayer should no longer be expected to fund this.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British Taxpayer should no longer be expected to fund this ego trip for our politicians and the great and the good. The projected costs of hosting the games are now projected at nearly £10billion and given that building works have yet to be started in earnest, these costs are likely to rise even further. The overburdened British Taxpayer should not be expected to fund this project any further and given that is unlikely that private sponsorship or the lottery will cover the costs it is clear that it is time for London to withdraw from its committment to hosting the Games.

rejection.details:
There are already several petitions on this issue
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympics
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympic+games
Please consider signing one of those.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
